segments.text: Good morning , Mr.Robinson . I am afraid there is a change in today's program . I just got word that your appointment with Mr . Smith , the general manager of Western Textile Co . , Ltd . , will have to be put off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr.Smith called just now that he had to fly to Shanghai on urgent business today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr.Smith is sending his apologies and has asked me to find out if the day after tomorrow would be all right with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that will be just as good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then shall we make it nine o'clock the day after tomorrow morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Then I can do some shopping today before going back to my country .
segments.speaker: S2
